TopicTitle: Looking for a planet pack with science.

Articles.Content: So far only Urania has science definitions in it. I LOVE the planets in that pack and id use that, but.. its just too over the top to have all that in one little system. So are there any other planet packs that have science in them? Im trying to spice up my career a little.

Nothing, eh? Then ill ask this. And forgive me if this is frowned upon, but is it possible to take a planet pack like Urania and edit it with planet factory so that its more spread out? Instead of it all stuffed in one system.

Nothing, eh? Then ill ask this. And forgive me if this is frowned upon, but is it possible to take a planet pack like Urania and edit it with planet factory so that its more spread out? Instead of it all stuffed in one system.

Nothing prevents you from doing that purely for personal use.
Okay. Ty regex. Yes just for personal use.
